name: saraya-qr-menu
description: QR Code Menu System for Saraya Drinks with CMS

scripts.start:dev: cross-env CORS_ORIGINS="http://localhost:3000,http://127.0.0.1:3000,http://localhost:3003,http://127.0.0.1:3003" concurrently "npm run start:backend:dev" "npm run start:frontend:dev" "npm run start:db"
scripts.start:backend:dev: cd backend && cross-env CORS_ORIGINS="http://localhost:3000,http://127.0.0.1:3000,http://localhost:3003,http://127.0.0.1:3003" npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:shared
scripts.kill:ports: lsof -ti:3001 | xargs -r kill -9 && lsof -ti:3003 | xargs -r kill -9 && lsof -ti:5555 | xargs -r kill -9
scripts.kill:ports:win: for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -aon ^| find ":3001"') do taskkill /f /pid %a && for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -aon ^| find ":3003"') do taskkill /f /pid %a
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: Saraya Drinks
